channel.title: CVE Feed for TCL -- LinkHub Mesh Wifi
channel.description: The latest CVEs for TCL -- LinkHub Mesh Wifi

item.title: CVE-2022-21201|2024-08-03T02:31:58.823Z -- tcl -- linkhub%20mesh%20wifi
item.description: A stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the confers ucloud_add_node_new functionality of TCL LinkHub Mesh Wi-Fi MS1G_00_01.00_14. A specially-crafted network packet can lead to stack-based buffer overflow. An attacker can send a malicious packet to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-21178|2024-08-03T02:31:59.065Z -- tcl -- linkhub%20mesh%20wifi
item.description: An os command injection vulnerability exists in the confsrv ucloud_add_new_node functionality of TCL LinkHub Mesh Wifi MS1G_00_01.00_14. A specially-crafted network packet can lead to arbitrary command execution. An attacker can send a malicious packet to trigger this vulnerability.
